comment: I took this course online. The course was fairly easy and the assignment details were always clear. However, he takes points off for very minor details, and is the type to give a 99% instead of a 100%, so follow instructions closely and proofread all grammar and spelling. He doesn't accept late work and he is easily accessible outside of class.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Genuinely my favorite professor I've ever had. Lectures were engaging and fun but he stayed professional and took class seriously. Super caring and understanding, he's an all around great guy and an incredible professor. There's no homework or discussion posts, just tests, but pay attention and study you should be fine. He honestly changed my life

Dr. V is a very funny and caring guy! He teaches well and keeps his students engaged. However, if you are a bad test taker like me, then I recommend skipping this course. You have 4 exams and 1 final, and that's it.

Dr. V is probably my favorite professor I've ever had! His lectures are so fun and engaging and we actually learned- it's not one of those classes where you memorize information for the test and immediately forget afterwards. He's a really nice guy and funny af, his tests are hard but not awful as long as you know the information. Def take him!!

I am a poli sci major and I took this class for a minor I am pursuing in addition to my degree, Dr. V is an amazing lecturer and made the content very easy to learn. He is also very understanding concerning absences and grading. I would recommend him to anyone studying at KSU!
The entire class was 5 tests, 4 of which counted. Great if you want to speed through a class, not great if you want to retain any information.

this was literally the best professor I've ever had. TAKE HIM if you get the opportunity. You will fail if you do not come to class bc he does not post lectures but they are fun and engaging. Only 4 test (No HW or discussion post). Test are fairly easy as long as you really study. He's very funny as well.

Dr. V is a great pick for a professor. While his tests can be harsh, if you know the material you will be fine. There are only tests, no outside homework, discussion posts, or other assignments which can be really great if you have a difficult class load. His class can drag and he gets off topic quite a bit, but he has a great sense of humor.

I really enjoyed my time in Dr. V's class! While I did enjoy it, I am not the best test taker and his test can be a bit tricker so be mindful of that. I would def recommend taking him but having a study group to make sure you're ready for the test.

I loved this course! Attendance is required and the slides are not posted on D2L but the class is amazing. He gives great lectures, provides examples, and explains difficult concepts in a way that is easy to digest. He gets along with students, cracks jokes, and makes the class a fun time. He has been my favorite professor so far! Take him!

Dr. V is 100% AMAZING! He is the type of professor that will lecture, but he makes fun out of his lectures. He will crack jokes, and poke fun back at you. I will say be prepared to study for his tests. It's not hard, but A LOT of information to consume. Overall, he is a great teacher! I am so excited to register for his classes next semester.

When Presenting The Lectures Professor Vizcarrondo talked too Fast. there were only four exams no extra credit or anything to improve your grade. I recommend studying as a class to make sure you do well on the test. 
make sure you read all the chapters more than one time and review all his lecture notes.

Hes a very chill teacher and makes class fun but makes the test so complexity to almost purposefully fail you. I would study for three days straight and still get low Bs and Cs on the test. Test are your main grade and he gives zero extra credit. If a youre terrible test taker Id say take anyone else.

entire grade based on 5 tests, but drops lowest test grade. you have to make an A on every single test to get an A in the class and he DOES NOT ROUND UP FINAL GRADES. end with a 89.9? your grade is a B. gives study guides. an easy class if you show up, grading system just sucks so you probably won't make an A

Do not waste your time taking Dr. V's agency class. He does not act professionally, and you will not learn anything in his class. He can, and will, hold grudges if he does not like your group. He yelled at my group multiple times, while also treating certain members like they were worthless. It is not worth the headache and the hit to your GPA.

Such an amazing professor. He is funny and charismatic. He only gives 5 tests and you can drop your lowest test grade. That is amazing to me!!! No busy work!! Great lectures. He does have a super strict attendance policy. But its worth it for this A and experience.

Dr. V is a nice man. I wish he would have cultivated the class material (which is very interesting) into more meaningful lectures. He sort of just goes off on tangents, and doesn't get to the point, and then tests on specific things HE said. I would advice to read the textbook instead of relying on his long lectures tbh.

If you miss more than 3 classes you get 10 points taken off your final grade. Only graded by tests and the tests were hard. There's usually 4 tests and lowest grade gets dropped. The class is just lectures and then tests at home with lockdown and camera. He can be snarky at times. You'll do good if you study hard and don't miss class.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things--Test heavy

comment: I had Professor V for online Crisis Com and I felt like the class would have been better in a classroom. He is very responsive and a quick grader, but the content of the class difficult to teach yourself in my opinion. He also is a very stern grader, so online was a bit difficult because I wasn't getting the instructions in person and explained.

Dr. V is awesome! PR4460 consists of 2 tests, group project, and a few assignments in between. His classes are lecture heavy, but all of his tests come straight from his powerpoints. He will kick you out of class if you're on your phone, which forces you to pay attention. If you're ready to work hard, take him!

Dr. V is fantastic! If I remember correctly, we had 3-4 tests (lowest grade will be dropped), and a group project. I generally dread going to school for class but I genuinely enjoyed going to his. Fantastic dude! What a bro.
best professor at Kennesaw. This teacher changed my life.

Dr. V makes this class interesting, just be sure to take down all the notes on the powerpoints and you will pass. That's all that there is on tests. He also gives out bonus questions. He's so professional and charming and kinda hot tbh

Dr. V is probably the best professor i've had at KSU. He doesn't put the lectures online so you have to go to class. However, he is very knowledgable and makes the lectures relevant and interesting. The tests are very straight forward from the test reviews. Great professor.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious
